EmailTemplate.description: Email to be mass sent to new users using SSO
EmailTemplate.name: Single Sign On Enabled
EmailTemplate.subject: Single sign on login instructions
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Employee,
We would like to share with you Single Sign On credentials which you need to use to access DH Salesforce.
Your SSO username is: primary email address
One time Password: SSO password
With initial SSO setup please follow the instructions on the screen, in case of doubt check this FAQ
After setting up SSO Authentication Methods, please already try to sign in to Salesforce:
1. Go to deliveryhero.my.salesforce.com 2. Click on SSO Button 3. Use your primary email and SSO password to login.
Should you be facing any issues with signing in to SSO please contact application.manager@deliveryhero.com.
Warm regards, Application Manager and Salesforce Team
